In the last ten years—historians of the future will note this—we’ve observed the creation of a new monetary and financial architecture that could serve as a replacement for everything that’s been known and used in the lifetime of every living person.<x3/>We’ve experienced a useful and secure money that works all over the world, is not connected to the state, and doesn’t need the existing banking system.

Nos últimos dez anos - historiadores futuros notarão isso - observamos a criação de uma nova arquitetura monetária e financeira que poderia servir como uma substituição para tudo que tem sido conhecido e usado no tempo de vida de toda pessoa viva <x3/>Experienciamos um dinheiro seguro e útil que trabalha ao redor do mundo todo, não é conectado ao estado, e não precisa do atual sistema bancário.

In the last ten years—historians of the future will note this—we’ve observed the creation of a new monetary and financial architecture that could serve as a replacement for everything that’s been known and used in the lifetime of every living person.<x3/>We’ve experienced a useful and secure money that works all over the world, is not connected to the state, and doesn’t need the existing banking system.
